summary: I imagine a bit narrower swords for elves so i\'ve made their weapons narrower. All from the dagger to the greatswords.
descriptionHtml:
For request I have added Daedric greatsword and Ebony Blade scabbards...
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Greatsword sheaths and scabbards by DoubleBrewski (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5624) compatibility patch arrived!

installation note:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
with scabbards: first download and install the above mod from DoubleBrewski then narrower blades 1.4, and finally use my \"scabbard compatibility update\" and the daedric one.

without scabbards: use the narrower blades 1.4

It\'s a simple mesh modification, original looking, original textures...
accidentally the new elven dagger mesh is on the picture instead of the old one. sry :)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy!

these files are also on steam workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197986870872/myworkshopfiles/

ps: if you like it please endorse
psps: if you like it very much please donate :)
author: Nergal
